title: Mob of Paid Hillary Goons Assault Homeless Black Woman In Broad Daylight.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/Pe7DynJ.jpg


While crowd of laughing, cheering sociopaths take selfies!

http://i.imgur.com/hwJNDYa.jpg


**[WARNING TO CHILDREN:]**
**[VIDEO CONTAINS VIOLENT HILLARY CLINTON THUGS!]**
(Please check with an adult before viewing this video)
**www.youtube.com/watch?v=ODs35j2R3p4**


The homeless woman was defending the Star of Trump on the world famous Hollywood Walk of Fame, near the corner of Hollywood Blvd, and Highland Ave. _(interestingly Highland Ave was also where Rolling Stone journalist Michael Hastings was assassinated with a car bomb)_

http://i.imgur.com/CVq0sCT.jpg
4-6 Hillary Goons can be seen kicking, shoving, and hitting a black homeless women, this is truly disgusting, but not surprising:


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ODs35j2R3p4

link to youtube video:
**www.youtube.com/watch?v=ODs35j2R3p4**
(moderators appear to be censoring all negative youtube videos showing hillary clinton violence!!!)



Listen to Hillary Clinton supporters make fun of the fact that all of this women's possessions are in this one cart. Is this funny to you people? This is why Hillary Clinton is repulsive to many Americans.

-------------------

update: HAPPY ENDING!!!

**The woman was found and I'm happy to report that she is no longer homeless!**

The perps, some of them, were also identified, and are in hiding. phones disconnected. no charges have been filed yet by the police...
